mapper.sql: SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_ID, SYS_FUNCTION.PARENT_ID, SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_NAME, SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_URL, SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_TYPE, SYS_FUNCTION.CREATE_TIME, SYS_FUNCTION.SORT, SYS_FUNCTION.image_url
mapper.select: SELECT FROM SYS_FUNCTION ORDER BY SYS_FUNCTION.SORT DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE SYS_FUNCTION SET
SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_NAME=#{functionName}, SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_URL=#{functionUrl}, SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_TYPE=${functionType}, SYS_FUNCTION.SORT=#{sort}, SYS_FUNCTION.image_url=#{imageUrl} WHERE SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_ID=#{functionId}
UPDATE SYS_FUNCTION SET SYS_FUNCTION.PARENT_ID=#{parentId} WHERE SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_ID=#{functionId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SYS_FUNCTION WHERE SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_ID IN (${value})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM SYS_FUNCTION LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE_FUNCTION ON SYS_ROLE_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_ID = SYS_FUNCTION.FUNCTION_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_USER ON SYS_USER.ROLE_ID = SYS_ROLE_FUNCTION.ROLE_ID WHERE SYS_USER.USER_ID=#{value} ORDER BY SYS_FUNCTION.SORT DESC
